name: CommodoRex
overview: CommodoRex is yet another version of T-Rex, a popular runner that you can play when your Chrome web browser is disconnected from the internet. And doing exactly the opposite was the purpose of this project: to play T-Rex when your C64 is online! With 64NIC+ or WiC64 cartridges attached to your C64 this is possible! But, in case you don't have these cartridges, you still can enjoy playing offline and save your hi-scores to disk or tape. Available on ZZAP! 64 Micro Action Issue #10's cover disk, on the Double Dino compilation cartridge by Bobr Games and as a digital download.
